definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)

sentences.english: It indicates that telomerase participates in the repair process of DNA injury induced by ionizing radiation.
sentences.chinese: 推测端粒酶参与电离辐射诱导DNA损伤的修复。

sentences.english: Telomerase is the enzyme that builds telomeres.
sentences.chinese: 而端粒酶顾名思义，就是生成端粒的那种酶。

sentences.english: Role of hTERT in apoptosis of cervical cancer induced by histone deacetylase inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 人端粒酶逆转录酶在宫颈癌组织中的表达及意义。

sentences.english: Inhibition of telomerase activity leads the cells to senescence and death.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶活性的抑制可以导致细胞的衰老和死亡。

sentences.english: Telomerase is an RNA-dependent DNA polymerase.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶是一种RNA依赖的DNA聚合酶。

sentences.english: Tumorigenesis is cogently associated with the activation of telomerase.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶与肿瘤的发生有十分密切的联系。

sentences.english: Telomerase was over expression in gastric signet-ring cell carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶在胃印戒细胞癌组织内过表达。

sentences.english: So far, one chemical appears to be key: telomerase.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，端粒酶似乎是问题的关键。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a silver-staining telomere repeat amplification protocol for detecting telomerase activity.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立检测端粒酶活性的银染端粒重复扩增法。

sentences.english: The ageing effects were reversed after injections of telomerase.
sentences.chinese: 在注射端粒酶后，结果反之。

sentences.english: So why not treat regular non-cancerous cells with telomerase?
sentences.chinese: 我们是否可以试着用端粒酶来处理正常的非癌细胞呢？

sentences.english: But, cell death is delayed if a lot of the enzyme telomerase is produced.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果造出大量端粒酶的话，可以推迟细胞的死亡。

sentences.english: The telomerase activity of stomach exfoliated cells was similar to that of the gastric tissue.
sentences.chinese: 胃刷落细胞的与活检组织的端粒酶活性水平是相近的。

sentences.english: Telomerase is a kind of ERT which causes catalysis and prolong the end of telomere.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶，是一种催化延长端粒末端的反向转录酶。
布莱克本又和格莱德尔一起发现了端粒酶。

definition: telomere, a protective DNA cap on a chromosome

pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1
